Text: A MUST SEE...if u like carzy assholes doing lots of china white, u'll love it.  BJM is a rad band.  best music documentary i've seen since devil & daniel johnston

Great documentary! Anton seems to be THE biggest asshole around, and he's clearly not much of a songwriter (I love the B.J.M. sound though), so it is a lot of fun to watch him disintegrate on film. Love the tambourine man!
One of the best rock docos you'll ever see. Brilliant! Dandy Warhols just played in Sydney, did a 3 hour show, they were actually smiling, which was a bit of a shock.
thanks for the up...it really is one of the best music docs.
